name: Isle Of Women
text: Activate: Main You may discard 1 card from your hand and rest this stage: If your leader has the (Kuja Pirates) type, return up to 1 of your Characters with the (Kuja Pirates) or (Amazon Lily) type to its owner's hand.

effect.text: You may discard 1 card from your hand and rest this stage: If your leader has the (Kuja Pirates) type, return up to 1 of your Characters with the (Kuja Pirates) or (Amazon Lily) type to its owner's hand.
conditions: your leader has the (Kuja Pirates) type
